text: haj ke mahine muqarrar hai, is liye jo shaqs in mein haj laazim karle, wo apni biwi se mel milap karne, gunah karne aur ladaayi jhagde karne se bachta rahe, tum jo neki karoge us se Allah ta’ala ba qabar hai, aur apne saath safar qarch le liya karo, sub se behtar tosha Allah ta’ala ka darr hai, aur aye aqal-mando mujh se darte raha karo
